lore: Like other Engines of Pain, the Cronos is a grisly amalgam of stimm-fed flesh and biomechanical implements shielded by a burnished carapace. Haemonculi create the Cronos to act as a parasite. Its esoteric syphons leech its victimâ€™s life essence, leaving them as husks before projecting the stolen vitality to other Drukhari.

otherAbilities.Pain Parasite (Aura):: Each time a Pain token is removed from your Pain token pool to Empower a unit, if that Empowered unit is within 9" of this unit, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1 Pain token.
